Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Moderno uređena starina od 227m2 - Otok Krk, Gostinjac Prodajemo kuću površine 227 m2 koja se nalazi u Gostinjcu. U prizemlju kuće se nalazi dnevna soba s blagavaonom i kuhinjom otvorenog tipa u staklu i kupaona. Na prvom katu su dvije sobe s kupaonama. Na drugom katu jedna spavaća soba s kupaonom i terasom. Okućnica od 700m2 i dva parkirna mjesta su u dvorištu. Hlađenje i grijanje je preko klima uređaja. Ima roštilj i dvije terase te prostrano dvorište s bazenom, idealno za odmor i uživanje. For sale: Modernly renovated traditional house of 227m2 in Gostinjac. We are selling a house with a surface area of 227m2 located in Gostinjac. On the ground floor, there is a living room with a dining area and an open-plan glass kitchen, as well as a bathroom. On the first floor, there are two bedrooms with bathrooms. On the second floor, there is one bedroom with a bathroom and a terrace. The property includes a 700m2 garden and two parking spaces in the yard. Cooling and heating are provided by air conditioning units. There is a barbecue area and two terraces, along with a spacious backyard with a pool, ideal for relaxation and enjoyment.
